description:
The CPUs visit an adults-only island full of forbidden pleasures--for work reasons, of course. Meanwhile, Peashy is stuck at home sulking after a fight with Neptune.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kindan no Island... de Anna Koto ya Konna Koto Yacchattari Yararechattari de Moshika Suru to Porori dokoro ka Perori made Aru ka mo Shirenakute Iyaan Neptune Hazukashiii Mitai na!

The Paradise (Island) Forbidden ...on Which People Will Do Things to Other People and Forget Wardrobe Malfunction Because There Might Even Be Some Tonguing and It`ll Be Like "Oh No, Neptune Is So Embarrassed~~"!
禁断の楽園[アイランド]...... であんなことやこんなことやっちゃったりやられちゃったりでもしかするとポロリどころかペロリまであるかもしれなくていや~んネプテューヌ恥ずかしい~みたいな!
